rows.label: qst000902_msg0001
rows.name: Thank you. You saved our lives.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0002
rows.name: I haven't introduced myself yet.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm Lizzy, the leader of
this mercenary band.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0004
rows.name:
We're still a small, fledgling
group with few members...

rows.label: qst000902_msg0005
rows.name:
But our dream is to one day
be known as the strongest
mercenary band in Invidia.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0006
rows.name:
To achieve that, we need to
take on many jobs... Oh, no!!

rows.label: qst000902_msg0007
rows.name:
We were actually hired by
a Nopon merchant named Doruru
as bodyguards, but...

rows.label: qst000902_msg0008
rows.name:
We were attacked by those
Ignas on the way... and
they took the merchant!

rows.label: qst000902_msg0009
rows.name:
We couldn't protect our client...
We're failures as mercenaries...

rows.label: qst000902_msg0010
rows.name:
Yes, but if we go to rescue him,
we'll just be beaten again...

rows.label: qst000902_msg0011
rows.name:
If we improve our weapons
and make a solid plan, we
might be able to do it...?

rows.label: qst000902_msg0012
rows.name: Ah, but we don't have time for that...

rows.label: qst000902_msg0013
rows.name: What! Really?!

rows.label: qst000902_msg0014
rows.name: ...You're right.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0015
rows.name:
A life is at stake. We
can't afford to be picky!

rows.label: qst000902_msg0016
rows.name: We'll rely on you!

rows.label: qst000902_msg0017
rows.name:
The Ignas took the captured
Doruru-san to their lair.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0018
rows.name:
From here, cross Minnet
Terrace and head straight
for Badfella's Cave Fort.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0019
rows.name:
I think you can still catch up to
them. Please save Doruru-san!!

rows.label: qst000902_msg0101
rows.name:
The Ignas' lair is in
Badfella's Cave Fort.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0102
rows.name:
From here, cross Minnet Terrace
and go straight. I think you
can still catch them.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0103
rows.name: Please save Doruru-san!
